name: PacMen VR
description:
Collect green spheres, earn mass and eat enemies, which will try to do the same!

Fight enemies in randomly generated mazes with the help of power ups.

Control by step-in-place, autorun or gamepad. Look down to enter menu.

Gyroscope is required.

Gameplay video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X74ywpp4kvg
